E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 4/2/1987
Subject: Good Game
Hello,
The fact that we won on a promotion day seems
to have a positive effect on our fan interest!
It increased slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Thursday, 4/3/1987
Subject: Promotion Day
Dear Sir,
Congratulations, our fan interest increased slightly because
our team won on a promotion day. Good job!

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Monday, 4/14/1987
Subject: Bernard Gilkey learns new position
Bernard Gilkey has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Third Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1987
Subject: Jim Presley healing process
Jim Presley is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Tuesday, 5/13/1987
Subject: Progress of Lenny Webster
Dear Sir,
Lenny Webster has an AVG of .277 at AA Shreveport Captains!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 5/16/1987
Subject: Progress of Craig Grebeck
Dear Sir,
Craig Grebeck is hitting the ball well at AA Shreveport Captains!
He has an AVG of .275, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/17/1987
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Ron Washington



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1987
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Barry Cort



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1987
Subject: Extension?

I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Mike L. Edwards
